title: Showcase Presents: The House of Mystery, Vol. 3
description: Over 500 pages of dark tales of mystery are collected in this value-priced volume!DC's Showcase series collected the 1970s horror series HOUSE OF MYSTERY continues with this new, third volume of terror tales! These stories features work by notable comics talents including horror master Bernie Wrightson, Michael Kaluta, Alex Niño, MAD Magazine artist Sergio Aragonés and many others.
author: Jack Oleck
